title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 4. Regulation 6 of the Principal Regulations is amended –
text_raw:
4. Regulation 6 of the Principal Regulations is amended – 

(a) 

in paragraph (1), by the substitution of “project owner” for 
“persons specified in paragraph (2)”, and 

(b) by the deletion of paragraph (2). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 July, 2022. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance.
